body:
Comment 1: 
For the record, test case:

package p

import "errors"

type error int

func F() error {
	return errors.New("x")
}

foo.go:8: cannot use errors.New("x") (type error) as type error in return argument
_Labels changed: added **repo-main**, **release-go1.5**._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._
